list_definition.definition: an official licence/license from the government giving one person or business the right to make and sell a particular article and to prevent others from doing the same

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She took out a patent on her design

list_definition.definition: to obtain a patent for; He patented his new invention.
